@_Ryan3 wrote:

Deltascape comes with a starter pack on login which will make your starter go to 1

Search for starter in client.java and just delete it or add the items to that.

item.title: ::starter error
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 5000000); sendMessage("The starter packet for catalyticscape players !"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

This is the code.

Client.java:7713: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage("The starter packet for catalytic players !"); ^ client.java:7716: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage("You already received your starter pack !"); ^ 2 errors compiled Files succesfully. Press any key to continue . . .

That is the error -.-

Read full topic
